General.Name: SAMPYO Cement Co. Ltd
General.Description: SAMPYO Cement Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes cement in South Korea. The company offers Portland, crude Portland, low heat Portland, blast furnace slag, and special cement products. It also exports its products to the United States, Japan, and other countries. The company was formerly known as TONGYANG Cement & Energy Corporation and changed its name to SAMPYO Cement Co., Ltd. in April 2017. SAMPYO Cement Co., Ltd. was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Samchok, South Korea.
